评论概述: MILT FRESH GOIN CRAZY WITH THE PJ VINTAGE VESTS #FRESHANOMICZ
评论详情: THIS VEST IS AMAZING!!!! LET ME SAY IN A WORLD WHERE AVERAGE 2X CAN FIT LIKE A MEDIUM,  YOU CAN ONLY CRINGE AT WHAT A 3X, 4X, 5X MAY LOOK LIKE. FAR BE IT FOR ME, I'M NOT DOWN WITH THE EXTRA MEDIUM REVOLUTION. IT WAS COOL WHEN I WAS YOUNG IN HIGH SCHOOL 2003 WHEN MY STYLE WAS A MIX BETWEEN PHARRELL, DONELL JONES, JUSTIN TIMBERLAKE, USHER, CAM'RON, DIDDY, BISHOP DON  MAGIC JUAN, RONALD ISLEY (DON'T ASK ME HOW ALL THAT WORKED BUT IT DID). BACK TO THE VESTS, THE SIZE ON THESE ARE TRUE TO SIZE. FULL CUT!!!! I ORDERED  TWO, ONE IN THE BLACK AND THE OTHER IN RED. WENT SICK WITH A MEAN BUTTON DOWN, CLEAN LIGHT BABY BLUE PORK PIE HAT, BOW-TIE, AND MY STACY BALDWIN( NO NOT STACY ADAMS, CALIFORNIA WHAT UP)  WINGTIPS TO CHURCH. CAN'T WAIT TO WEAR THE RED ONE THIS COMING SUNDAY.  A CROSS BETWEEN 1920'S ARISTOCRAT, MIXED WITH A LIL CAB CALOWAY, PACHUCO ZOOT SUIT VIBE. MANNNN I'M KINDA HURT THAT I STUMBLED UPON THESE TOO LATE. I DEFINITELY WOULD PURCHASE EVERY COLOR (NEED WHITE, BLUE, GREEN, GOLD, ECT).  I EMAILED THE COMPANY AND THEY REPLIED SAYING THEY WOULD THINK ABOUT REPLENISHING THE THEIR STOCK OF BIGGER SIZES. PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE, HELP ME!!!! WHEN YOU FIND SLEEK, SLICK, CLASSIC VINTAGE STYLE PIECES, YOU CAN'T HELP BUT ADD THEM TO YOUR ARSENAL.
